newsitem.title: USA: Cost Plus Sept same store sales.
newsitem.headline: Cost Plus Sept same store sales.

text.p: Cost Plus Inc said same store sales for the five-week period ended Oct. 5 rose 8.9 percent, and year to date same store sales were up 5.4 percent.
Total sales for the five-week period ended Oct. 5, 1996 were $16.9 million, up from $14 million in the year-ago period. Total year-to-date sales rose 20.2 percent to $109 million.
The company operated 56 stores as of October 7, compared with 47 a year earlier.
